#include <stdio.h>
#include <stdlib.h>
#include <math.h>
 
 
int main(void) {
int n;
 
 
int i,j,k,l;
int x1,y1,x2,y2;
double slope;
int temp;
double t,s;
int current;
scanf("%d",&n);
for(k=1;k<=n;k++){
    int ans=0;
    scanf("%d",&temp);
    scanf("%d %d %d %d",&x1,&y1,&x2,&y2);
    if(x2==x1){
        ans=abs(y2-y1);
        ans++;
    }
    else{
    if(x1>x2){
        t=x1;
        x1=x2;
        x2=t;
        t=y1;
        y1=y2;
        y2=t;
        
    }
    t=0.5;
    current=y1;
    slope=((double)(y2)-(double)(y1))/((double)(x2)-(double)(x1));
    
    s=y1+slope*t;
    if(round(s)-s==0.5)
            ans++;
    ans+=(abs)((int)(round(s))-y1)+1;
    current=(int)(round(s));
    
    for(i=1;i<(x2-x1);i++){
        s=y1+slope*(t+i);
        if(round(s)-s==0.5)
            ans++;
        ans+=(abs)((int)(round(s))-current)+1;
        current=(int)(round(s));
    }
    
    ans+=(abs)(y2-current)+1;
    
    
    
    }
   printf("\nCase %d: %d",k,ans);
 
}
	return 0;
}
